title: Tennessee's governor has halted executions for an independent review into lethal injections following an inmate's last-minute reprieve - CNN
content: Tennessee's governor has halted executions for an independent review into lethal injections following an inmate's last-minute reprieve  CNNView Full Coverage on Google News
description: Tennessee's governor has announced a pause of executions in the state amid plans for an independent review into the lethal injection process.
